thread.title: SearchYourCloud Announces OEM Agreement with SAP to Improve
thread.title_full: SearchYourCloud Announces OEM Agreement with SAP to Improve

author: SearchYourCloud
title: SearchYourCloud Announces OEM Agreement with SAP to Improve
text:
SAN FRANCISCO SearchYourCloud (SYC), a provider of a patented federated search and security application for enhanced searching and sharing of data across multiple cloud and enterprise platforms, today announces an OEM agreement with SAP. Through this agreement, SYC will integrate and offer the capabilities of SAP HANAÂ® Cloud Platform with the SearchYourCloud Server, which returns more accurate and specific results in current workflows, from the desktop to the cloud, with a single search query. The complexities of searching encrypted data combined with the overhead of an instant-access index can be onerous. SearchYourCloud Server runs on SAP HANA Cloud Platform, which enables businesses to increase productivity flows through indexed search capabilities and mitigate impact on operational speed or lag in providing the results or files that have been requested by the user. The SAP HANA database serves back the requests instantly, enabling the SYC software to run at its optimum and respond to requests quickly and expediently.
The SYC Server allows users to drop and share files into the cloud store of their choice directly from their devices, while its patented federated search allows users to perform a single search across all of their internal and external file storage and applications, including Dropbox, Google Drive, Microsoft Box, Microsoft SharePoint and Microsoft Exchange. Using enabled document-level encryption on all files, SYC Server provides a completely secure, at-rest security layer, complementing the existing firewalls and mobile device management solutions that are already in place.
SAP HANA Cloud Platform allows partners to build and extend applications in the cloud using the in-memory technology and process acceleration provided by the SAP HANA platform, which enables businesses to make smarter decisions faster through real-time analysis and reporting.
"This agreement is a great step for everyone involved. With SAP HANA Cloud Platform, we can now help customers increase their business flow through a secure, private cloud that allows them access to all of their sensitive documents from any web-connected device using one quick search," said Simon Bain , CEO, SearchYourCloud. "We are also very happy to announce our first deployment of SAP HANA Cloud Platform for a customer that required a secure method to utilize Microsoft SharePoint online, as well as enhance its search capabilities. Working on SAP HANA Cloud Platform has enabled us to provide this functionality without disruption to the SharePoint online functionality."
He continued, "As a member of the SAP Startup Focus program, we are able to grow our consumer demand and focus our capabilities on what our enterprise, integrator and reseller customers need to secure access to their business-critical applications and data in the cloud."
The SAP Startup Focus program supports startups in developing new applications on SAP HANA, SAP's real-time database platform that streamlines analytics, planning, and predictive and sentiment assessments to allow business to operate in real time. The program is an accelerator for startups working on big data, predictive and real-time analytics.
SYC also announced the immediate availability of its enhanced search and security application on its Web site through SAP Store at www.sapstore.com . SYC is offering a free version of its desktop application for individual users on Microsoft Outlook and Apple OS X Desktop. There are also additional plug-in services and corporate public cloud and enterprise private cloud services for SAP HANA Cloud Platform available. Visit www.SearchYourCloud.com to learn more or for immediate downloading.
About SearchYourCloud
SearchYourCloud is resolutely focused on developing innovative, groundbreaking technology and products (SearchYourCloud Server) based on patented algorithms. SYC software can additionally be embedded, integrated and implemented by third parties such as carriers/mobile operators, systems integrators and software providers. SYC also partners with companies that have in-house IT development/integration expertise wishing to utilize its technology to solve current technical and/or business challenges. The SearchYourCloud technology can be used as a front-end access method for existing private or public cloud services, or as the backbone to deliver new services as well as formidable layered security at the file and database level to supplement existing security schemes. In either capacity it delivers a new information access paradigm that promises to revolutionize the way in which users access and secure their critical data in the cloud. For more information, visit www.searchyourcloud.com/ .
